review.title: “Run, don't walk away”
review.pros: Pros – Most location managers are great to work with. Flexible hours are usually available if you need them.
review.cons: Cons – Employees are viewed as replaceable and turnover is very high. Raises are almost unheard of, promotions do happen, but not very often. Upper management's only concern is the $ they can put in their pockets. The atmosphere at that level is to bully whomever in order to get what they want.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Get your head out of the sand. It is no longer 1978. Talk with your employees and listen to what they may have to say, as they have valuable information that you don't hear. Treat them as if you really do care about what they do and you will have that attitude returned to you.

review.title: “Keep looking....”

review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Follow and enforce the rules of the company handbook. Increase hourly wage scale to keep quality employees from leaving... Upgrade the benefit package. Take your head out of the sand, this is 2013.
